Class BeanHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.bean.BeanHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
CacheEntry, java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
public class BeanHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler, CacheEntry

The handler responsible for pre-processing the requests made on the coadunation beans.
